website_summaries.verdict: Five different cleaning cycles let you refresh everything from jewelry to razors and dentures. Comes with a non-toxic, planet-friendly cleaning solution.
pros: Safe for most metals as well as eyeglasses, razors, mouthguards and more
Digital display with push-button controls and auto shut-off
Includes basket, watch and bracelet holder, ring holder and non-toxic, biodegradable cleaning solution
cons: Be careful not to crowd the cleaner baskets to get the best possible cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Jewelry Cleaner Kit for my wife for Xmas and she absolutely loves it! The product arrived perfectly on time- as expected- and is incredibly easy to use. The seller was great to work with as well and provided lots of great email updates to minimize the concern over the gift arriving on time. She busted it out immediately after unwrapping it and- before we knew it- her jewelry was sparkling like new! We've tried a few other jewelry cleaner solutions and this one is by far the best one we've used. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to keep my jewelry in for the max amount of time and redo it 6 times. Then I had to use a jewelry cloth to scrub it all clean. Some never came up clean. I used the entire bottle of the cleaner as I cleaned the water and restarted it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Dione

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I just received and have only used it once, but I think I am very pleased with this purchase. I put 8 pieces and a watch in and they all came out sparkling as if brand new from the jeweler. Definitely recommend if your pieces are looking dull and lackluster, this will make them shine like new again. I wish I had thought of this much sooner. The machine is super quiet. I will need to get more solution as the bottle isn’t too big and won’t last long. Overall totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Horn

customer_reviews.title: Shines like new
customer_reviews.text: Don't overcrowd the container. It cleaned my wife's jewelry and came out looking new, according to her. She was very pleased. I bought this as a gift as I got tired of seeing her use a small container, soaking and brushing her jewelry. This purchase was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David W Henry

customer_reviews.title: If you have jewelry - you NEED this cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good about this ultrasonic Jewelry Cleaner Kit!!! I would highly recommend to anyone who needs to really clean your jewelry! It is whisper quiet, and I was just amazed at how sparkling clean everything came out. I seriously feel like I have all new jewelry, and all of my stones are sparkling - like just out of a jewelry store. I am in love with this - if I could give 10 stars ⭐️ ⭐️, I would!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine as a gift over the holidays. Works very well and is easy to use. Actually purchased a number of additional jewelry cleaners from this small business and everything was great! Even better, customer service is excellent! We had a few questions and the email responses from the seller were quick and the responses were accurate. Will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: cd21soe

customer_reviews.title: Clean jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I’ve onky used it once but have really enjoyed it. I used it on my glasses and also my jewelry. First time everything looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie

customer_reviews.title: Your jewelry's best friend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine!! Compact size but holds a number of pieces at one time and thoroughly cleans gold jewelry and gems. Basket doesn't have a handle..which would make it even better.... but it can be removed easily. I had a minor issue when the machine was received, but the family-owned company followed up immediately! Outstanding service.
customer_reviews.author: BRP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing like a fresh clean gleam on diamond jewlery is there? I had a much smaller cleaner for years and it worked pretty well but it was tired. I chose this one because it's large enough to clean everything from earings to glasses. It's easy to operate and light weight enough to not be a pain to store in a closet when not in use. It has two different power settings and does a great job cleaning gold, silver and gemstones. Glad to have it handy to keep my wedding ring shinning all the time.
customer_reviews.author: InHisService

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked really well on the rings and necklaces that were used as a trial run. The sample bottle of cleaner that was provided won’t last long, so I’ll use plain water and see how that works. Overall, this is a good purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMom

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: It really cleans my rings, necklaces very well and it is quiet too. You won't be disappointed if you purchase the jewelry cleaner. what more can I say. it came on time, well packed.
customer_reviews.author: MARJORIE H.

customer_reviews.title: worked great at getting my rings clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my intricate wedding ring, which I constantly dirty as a result of my gardening obsession (even with gloves). The first use, the ring was notably cleaner. My husband used it for his watch and it was amazing how dirty the water ended up. I think we will get a lot of use out of this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my ultrasonic cleaner! I used it the same day as it arrived and all my jewelry look amazing now. The shine of the diamonts on my bracelet and all my rings is better then new. Very easy to use and has great capacity but compact at the same time. I did quite a not of a research on similar products and am extremely happy that I picked Simple shine!
customer_reviews.author: Ilina Encheva

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic jewelry cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how my rings turned out. They do look like I got them professionally cleaned by a jeweler. I hope that this machine will last a long time. I had purchased another one from a different manufacturer and it stopped working for no reason after about 6 months. I'm hopeful that I'll have better luck with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great... if it can work
customer_reviews.text: I am going to return this item, because it just stopped working. I received this item less than a week ago and used it about 8 or so times. It worked fine and was doing its job, but the machine started acting weird and wouldn't stop bubbling after the timer went down to zero. After maybe using it a few more times sporadically during this 1-week period, now it just won't turn on. I followed the directions to make sure I used it properly, but it just died on me. The one I received may just be defective; however, I am going to return it and try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Hrach

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Like A Dream
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, and very effective. I wear a mouthpiece to help eliminate snoring. This ultrasonic cleaner was the best product to clean that mouthpiece.
customer_reviews.author: G_Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift For A Pirate!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother-In-Law is like a crafty pirate, when it comes to her vast collection of jewelry. I have to say, she was happy as Patch Eyed Jack with this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Knocked My Cap Off

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use.. comes with concentrated liquid cleaner, add a few drops and plain water. My pandora jewelry looks amazing. For heavily soiled pieces, run twice. Makes almost NO NOISE. No bubbles, it is ultrasonic so it starts with a little buzz. **NOTE** The basket goes all the way into the water, so your items are submerged in water. IT IS NOT STEAM.. It is ultrasonic cleaning but your stuff is in 2 inches of water. So make sure your watches are WATERPROOF. Read warning about certain stones, opals, tanzanite etc that should not be cleaned with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Up Old Jewelry Nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the homemade cleaners and 3 store-bought solutions we’ve tried. Surprised, and definitively pleased, with how quiet it is during operation.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned eye glasses great and the rings. I only left them in for 180 seconds but if had left in longer I am sure the rings that were really dirty would have cleaned up even more. I had to take a small jewelry brush to those and put back in. They all sparkle so much, just as if the jewelry store did them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bugandboo

customer_reviews.title: too small for safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 inch too small for safety glasses. It would have been perfect if 1/2 inch longer and 1/2 inch narrower. Watch stand is a mystery to me yet. Watch stays above water and apple watch doesn't stay on it. All else is good.
customer_reviews.author: N.Dryl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This machine is awesome. It’s gotten my jewelry really clean using it. I love the timer that it has.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for biggest price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cleaning jewelry. Purchased to help clean SLA 3d prints and seems to work fine for it not being the intended application.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Not a jeweler quality
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my choker chain is super grubby but it is not as shiny as when I got it done in Albuquerque. It is easy to use though. I'll try it on other items and get back to you.
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all around jewelry cleaner. It's not too large, easy to store and very easy to use. Most importantly, it works great! My wife and I took all the jewelry we currently wear (of course she wears MUCH than I do!) including both our diamond wedding rings and when the process was finished I rinsed and laid out all the jewelry on a towel. My wife looked at it and simply said, "Wow!". It looked like a jewelry store! Definitely recommend this ultrasonic cleaner! Rocco
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use the ultrasonic cleaner for my glasses. The skin oil always leave a foggy film on the lenses no matter how many times I use dawn or glass cleaning solution the film stays. My optician cleaned them with her sonic cleaner. Perfect. I went to Amazon and got my own. Used it 3 days ago and my glasses are still oil free. Will try it with my jewelry next but I am confident it will do a truly fantastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work well for me. Jewelry not clean after several rounds. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Powell

customer_reviews.title: Cleans jewelry well
customer_reviews.text: Does a very good cleaning job on our jewelry. The gold and silver are fresh and clean, and the diamonds sparkle like new. No problems with the unit, which is attractively designed and appears to be well made. Just started using it, so durability cannot be evaluated yet. Use is straight forward and simple. Would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LJohnson

customer_reviews.title: East to set up, use, and clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is it is too small, volume wise, for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove tarnish from copper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove tarnish from my copper necklace but it did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love my ultrasonic cleaner. I have many silver jewelry pieces I have not used in years as they were so dirty, but this cleaner made them shiny and they look like new. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: My glasses have never been cleaner!!!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, easy to use, shipping was quick. Highly recommend, would by again.
customer_reviews.author: ibetrkn

customer_reviews.title: I did one extra long cycle of time with fresh liquid the first time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my jewelry (that I thought looked pretty clean at the outset. I was so wrong. Really cool little machine and economical. Did a terrific job loosening debris and getting a full sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: anna namnoum

customer_reviews.title: Simple Clean ultrasonic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and in perfect condition, I opened box and inspected contents, all is good. I purchased this as a Christmas gift, so it has not been used yet, but I'm sure it will perform perfectly, seller is top notch, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was completely amazed by how clean my jewelry was after I ran it through this little machine. I had some earrings that I thought I should throw away, but after cleaning them in this jewelry cleaner, they look like new! My rings, earrings and necklaces all look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and got my rings sparkling clean!! Would recommend to anyone. I also really appreciated the personal message from the seller who told me to contact them with any issues I may have.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was given a tennis bracelet for Christmas - and now it look as good as new! This product works perfectly; it is quiet, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MCT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.Quiet. But not heated.
customer_reviews.text: I did not seem to clean my necklace as well as I thought it should. But I heard no noise as I had heard others say.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Make the timer easier to set
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to start using, but nice and quiet and does a great job. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is super quiet .. deep cleans .. multiple time settings .. very good perchase !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: No more tarnished jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: This system is easy to use and cleaned my sterling silver jewelry quickly. Everything is shiny and beautiful again!
customer_reviews.author: E. T. Richard

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry cleaner. It keeps my engagement ring so clean and sparkly! It’s amazing the difference it makes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andreah F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my glasses and jewelry very well and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: broke down after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: worked great and then just stopped working after occasional use, paid extra to get a high quality one and ended up with a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Larsen/Dianna Wallen

customer_reviews.title: an this thing six times at max.  seconds and the few pieces of sterling jewlery were still tarnish,
customer_reviews.text: not so good. waste of time and money. waste of time. I guess I will research and try for better
customer_reviews.author: Pat R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for cleaning my wedding ring and watch. Works great and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought more as gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much, I bought one for my Monday for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry cleaner does a great job. As soon as it arrived I cleaned my watch and then began with necklaces and rings!
customer_reviews.author: Chessie Louise

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than 2 mths
customer_reviews.text: This product died after less than 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Ultrasonic Jewelry cleaner kit
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product it made my jewelry sparkle like brand new. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hinda Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner worked great! I used it for rings and a diamond bracelet. They all came out sparkling. I have since bought two more machines for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean up coins that I find with my metal detector. I was surprised how fast and good it worked and it's just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Heim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly amazing machine. Works fantastic. Also a great value would make a great gift for anyone with jewelry
customer_reviews.author: S. J. W.

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first now not working
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product daily. Now it’s not heating up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not So Sparkling
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions provided. Using the provided solution, my silver did not become as clean as expected. I had to continue cleaning with a polishing cloth afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Svilicich

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is working great for me! I’ve cleaned a lot of items. I especially like using it on the lowest setting and cleaning my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love how quite it is and it really does work. Might end up getting another one later on.
customer_reviews.author: Kvallejo1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results on all my jewelry and glasses! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Coats

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I regularly clean my rings but using this product they were like brand new! I can't stop looking at how beautiful my rings look now - LOVE!

customer_reviews.title: eeehhhh
customer_reviews.text: it was ok . it most definitely made my jewelry shine . well after i polished it . easy to use .

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This works soooo well! My husband and I were so impressed at how sparkly our jewelry looked after using it.

customer_reviews.title: Diamond missing.
customer_reviews.text: Knocked a diamond out of my engagement ring. I was so mad. So now I have to go pay a small fortune for that to be replaced.

customer_reviews.title: It works

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.title: The best ultrasonic jewelry cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Deep cleans my diamond jewelry & watches perfectly! Very easy to use!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my new jewelry cleaner. It cleaned up my precious jewelry just beautifully. I highly recommend it to anyone that has a need for one. Definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very, very quiet. I cleaned my rings and they look like new.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Might as well rinse off your jewelry in the sink...same affect.

customer_reviews.title: It did a good job cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well so far. I have only used it once.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Really Well.
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned my spot watch great. Looks brand new. The only thing, I was a little disappointed that there were no instructions for use or care of the unit.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I could see difference after one use.

product_meta.title: Ultrasonic Jewelry Cleaner Kit - New Premium Cleaning Machine and Liquid Cleaner Solution Concentrate - Digital Sonic Cleanser for Watches Glasses Dental and More
product_meta.description:
Our Ultrasonic Cleaning Kit delivers a powerful yet gentle deep down clean and includes everything you need for cleaning, sanitizing, and restoring gleaming luster to jewelry such as a necklace, earring, ring, bracelet, waterproof watch, eyeglasses, toothbrush, dentures, mouth guard, coins, shaver head, razor or delicate items made from silver, gold, brass, copper, platinum, titanium, stainless steel, diamonds, glass or plastic. The machine is 60Hz and 35W with .6L liter capacity. This complete kit makes an excellent Valentines Day Christmas or birthday gift, and comes with an ultrasonic cleaner, basket, watch / bracelet holder, ring holder, concentrate cleaning solution and owner’s manual - all the the tools needed to clean and restore a sparkling like new shine! We are a small family owned business committed to your full satisfaction!




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 8 x 6 inches; 3.3 Pounds
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :April 26, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Simple Shine
 * ASIN :B07CNTNTDX

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #18,586 in Industrial & Scientific (See Top 100 in Industrial & Scientific)  *  #29 inLab Ultrasonic Cleaners 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars179 ratings Our Ultrasonic Cleaning Kit delivers a powerful yet gentle deep down clean and includes everything you need for cleaning, sanitizing, and restoring gleaming luster to jewelry such as a necklace, earring, ring, bracelet, waterproof watch, eyeglasses, toothbrush, dentures, mouth guard, coins, shaver head, razor or delicate items made from silver, gold, brass, copper, platinum, titanium, stainless steel, diamonds, glass or plastic. The machine is 60Hz and 35W with .6L liter capacity. This complete kit makes an excellent Valentines Day Christmas or birthday gift, and comes with an ultrasonic cleaner, basket, watch / bracelet holder, ring holder, concentrate cleaning solution and owner’s manual - all the the tools needed to clean and restore a sparkling like new shine! We are a small family owned business committed to your full satisfaction!
feature_bullets: DELIVERS A GENTLE DEEP CLEAN MAKING JEWELRY, WATCHES & MORE SPARKLE LIKE NEW: Millions of tiny bubbles gently break up and lift away dirt and grime effectively restoring luster and shine to jewelry such as necklaces, earrings, rings, bracelets and waterproof watches. It also cleans and sanitizes eyeglasses, toothbrushes, dentures, mouth guards, coins, shaver heads and razors. Safe for silver, gold, brass, copper, platinum, titanium, stainless steel, diamonds, glass, plastic.

ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY & FEATURES: Has push button controls, digital display, automatic shut off and clear viewing window so you can monitor cleaning. The five cleaning cycles can accommodate different soiling level and material cleaning needs. Clean like the jewelry store does from home. Kit includes ultrasonic cleaner 60Hz 35W .6L basket (dims: 6"x5"x1.7" ), watch / bracelet holder, ring holder and cleaning concentrate solution - everything needed for a deep clean to restore to a sparkling shine!

COMES WITH OUR BEST SELLING CLEANING CONCENTRATE: Our highly effective cleaning solution is 100% non-toxic and biodegradable making it safe for you and the planet. It contains no ammonia or harsh chemicals and is specially formulated to deep clean while not harming you or your jewelry. This kit makes a great Christmas, birthday, graduation or anniversary gift for men, women, boyfriend, girlfriend, mom or dad. We stand behind the quality of our products!

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY: We use premium quality materials and the latest in Ultrasonic Cleaning technology not found in other lesser quality discount models. Our Ultrasonic Cleaner Kit is made to strict, tested, trade-secret standards.
